channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:16 Reduce the threat of Artobstil to Chervonohrigorivska Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 13:16 Reduce the threat of Artobstil to Chervonohrigorivska Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
